delete-cluster.Description: Delete the specified cluster from the kubeconfig

delete-context.Description: Delete the specified context from the kubeconfig

delete-user.Description: Delete the specified user from the kubeconfig

get-clusters.Description: Display clusters defined in the kubeconfig

get-users.Description: Display users defined in the kubeconfig

rename-context.Description: Rename a context from the kubeconfig file

set.Description: Set an individual value in a kubeconfig file

set-cluster.Description: Set a cluster entry in kubeconfig

set-context.Description: Set a context entry in kubeconfig

set-credentials.Description: Set a user entry in kubeconfig

unset.Description: Unset an individual value in a kubeconfig file

use-context.Description: Set the current-context in a kubeconfig file

view.Description: Display merged kubeconfig settings or a specified kubeconfig file
